00206   BeTrgEvent &setAllFifoWords(unsigned int n_words, const unsigned int * const word_list) 
00207   { 
00208     
00209 
00210     for(unsigned int word_i=0; word_i<n_words; word_i++) {
00211       obj()->setIntVal(kNBeTrgEventIntValues+word_i,word_list[word_i]); 
00212     }
00213     return *this;
00214   };
00215 
00218   int getNFifoWords() const {
00219     return getNInt()-kNBeTrgEventIntValues;
00220   };
00221 
00225   int getFifoWord(unsigned int word_index) const {
00226 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00227     if (word_index >= static_cast<unsigned int>(getNFifoWords())) {
00228       throw std::out_of_range("BeTrgEvent::getFifoWord> word index out of range!");
00229     }
00230 #endif
00231     return getIntVal(kNBeTrgEventIntValues+word_index);
00232   };
00233   
00246   IntVec &getFifoWords(IntVec &dest) const {
00247     dest.clear();
00248     for (unsigned int word_i=0; word_i < static_cast<unsigned int>( getNFifoWords() ); word_i++) {
00249       dest.push_back(getFifoWord(word_i));
00250     }
00251     return dest;
00252   };

00278   void print(  std::ostream& os) {
00279     /*    os << "board: " << BoardID(getBoardId()) <<std::endl
00280        << " pre busy trigger counter=" << getPreBusyTriggerCounter() << std::endl
00281        << " trigger counter="          << getTriggerCounter()        << std::endl
00282        << " trigger busy status="      << getTriggerBusyStatus()     << std::endl
00283        << " input status="             << getInputStatus()           << std::endl
00284        << " input catch="              << getInputCatch()            << std::endl
00285        << " initial fifo status="      << getInitialFifoStatus()     << std::endl
00286        << " final fifo status="        << getFinalFifoStatus()       << std::endl;
00287     */
00288     for (unsigned int fifo_i=0; fifo_i < static_cast<unsigned int>(getNFifoWords()); fifo_i++) {
00289       os << " " << std::setw(8) << std::hex << getFifoWord(fifo_i);
00290       if (fifo_i%4==3) {
00291         os << std::endl;
00292       }
00293     }
00294 
00295     os << std::endl;
00296   };
